purpurclient.options.title: Purpur Client Options
purpurclient.options.fix-chat-stutter.to: Enabling will process chat on another thread so it doesn't clog up the render thread
Enabling will add bee counts in the debug screen (F3) when looking at bee hives and nests
purpurclient.options.splash-screen.toolt: Enabling will use Purpur's splash screen instead of Mojang's
purpurclient.options.window-title.toolti: Enabling will use Purpur's window title instead of Mojang's
purpurclient.options.experiment-disabled: Please enable the experiment required for this mob
purpurclient.options.seat.title: Adjust Seat for %s
